TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]All spiders of level 4 or above can be upgraded to giant spiders once the city hosting Silksong Cradle reaches 11 population.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]All spiders of level 4 or above can be upgraded to giant spiders once the city hosting Silksong Cradle reaches 11 population.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]All spiders of level 4 or above can be upgraded to giant spiders once the city hosting Silksong Cradle reaches 11 population.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]All spiders of level 4 or above can be upgraded to giant spiders once the city hosting Silksong Cradle reaches 11 population.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]All spiders of level 4 or above can be upgraded to giant spiders once the city hosting Silksong Cradle reaches 11 population.

TEXT.English: Archosian Hunters spend weeks in the wilds of Erebus, stalking prey with a spider companion. When it is time to strike, the spider attacks and paralyses the target with venom before the hunter deals the deathblow. The tribe have been living with spiders for so long that the venom in the carcass is no longer deadly to them - though it does take it's toll. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When a hunting team survives the wilds long enough to become noteworthy, they may be sent further afield to hunt more dangerous prey. The spider becomes more deadly as it grows and the hunter relies on it to a greater degree. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The most successful hunters may find that they develop mutations as they continue to eat the poisoned meat of their kills. This is seen as a "gift" from Mother and a sign that the hunter is favoured. In anycase, many of these mutations prove beneficial in combat and the Spiderkin is practically immune to further poisoning.
TEXT.French: Les Veneurs Archosiens passent des semaines dans les contr�es sauvages d'Erebus, pistant ses proies avec son compagnon Araign�e. Lorsqu'il faut frapper, l'Araign�e attaque et paralyse sa cible avec son venin avant que le Veneur fasse le tir mortel. Le clan a v�cu avec les Araign�es depuis si longtemps que le venin pr�sent dans la carcasse n'est plus mortel pour eux (m�me s'il continue de prendre son d�). [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Quand un bin�me de chasse survit suffisamment longtemps pour �tre remarqu�, ils peuvent �tre envoy�s encore plus loin pour chasser des proies encore plus dangereuses. L'Araign�e devient plus dangereuse � mesure qu'elle grandit et le Reclus compte encore plus sur elle. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Les chasseurs les plus efficaces peuvent d�couvrir qu'ils d�veloppent des mutations tandis qu'ils continuent de manger la viande empoisonn�e de leurs victimes. Elles sont vues comme des "pr�sents" de la M�re et un signe que le chasseur est favoris�. N'importe comment, la plupart de ces mutations se r�v�lent b�n�fiques en combat et l'Arachnomorphe est pratiquement immunis� � tout empoisonnement ult�rieur.
TEXT.German: Archosian Hunters spend weeks in the wilds of Erebus, stalking prey with a spider companion. When it is time to strike, the spider attacks and paralyses the target with venom before the hunter deals the deathblow. The tribe have been living with spiders for so long that the venom in the carcass is no longer deadly to them - though it does take it's toll. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When a hunting team survives the wilds long enough to become noteworthy, they may be sent further afield to hunt more dangerous prey. The spider becomes more deadly as it grows and the hunter relies on it to a greater degree. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Die erfolgreichsten J�ger m�gen Mutationen an sich bemerken, wenn sie nur kontinuierlich das vergiftete Fleisch ihrer Beute verzehren. Dies wird als ein "Geschenk" von Mutter und als Zeichen ihrer Gunst angesehen. In jedem Fall entpuppen sich viele dieser Mutationen als n�tzlich im Kampf, so sind die Sipplinge der Spinnentiere z.B. praktisch immun gegen weitere Vergiftungen.
TEXT.Italian: Archosian Hunters spend weeks in the wilds of Erebus, stalking prey with a spider companion. When it is time to strike, the spider attacks and paralyses the target with venom before the hunter deals the deathblow. The tribe have been living with spiders for so long that the venom in the carcass is no longer deadly to them - though it does take it's toll. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When a hunting team survives the wilds long enough to become noteworthy, they may be sent further afield to hunt more dangerous prey. The spider becomes more deadly as it grows and the hunter relies on it to a greater degree. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The most successful hunters may find that they develop mutations as they continue to eat the poisoned meat of their kills. This is seen as a "gift" from Mother and a sign that the hunter is favoured. In anycase, many of these mutations prove beneficial in combat and the Spiderkin is practically immune to further poisoning.
TEXT.Spanish: Archosian Hunters spend weeks in the wilds of Erebus, stalking prey with a spider companion. When it is time to strike, the spider attacks and paralyses the target with venom before the hunter deals the deathblow. The tribe have been living with spiders for so long that the venom in the carcass is no longer deadly to them - though it does take it's toll. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When a hunting team survives the wilds long enough to become noteworthy, they may be sent further afield to hunt more dangerous prey. The spider becomes more deadly as it grows and the hunter relies on it to a greater degree. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The most successful hunters may find that they develop mutations as they continue to eat the poisoned meat of their kills. This is seen as a "gift" from Mother and a sign that the hunter is favoured. In anycase, many of these mutations prove beneficial in combat and the Spiderkin is practically immune to further poisoning.

TEXT.English: Ia! Black queen of the depths with a thousand young!

TEXT.German: Ia! Black queen of the depths with a thousand young!
TEXT.Italian: Ia! Black queen of the depths with a thousand young!
TEXT.Spanish: Ia! Black queen of the depths with a thousand young!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Explode and apply poison to all units in range.

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Explode and apply poison to all units in range.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Explode and apply poison to all units in range.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]When stationed in a city, +10% chance to grant Spider Mutation - Venom Secretion to newly created melee and recon units in the city.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]When stationed in a city, +10% chance to grant Spider Mutation - Venom Secretion to newly created melee and recon units in the city.

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]When stationed in a city, +10% chance to grant Spider Mutation - Venom Secretion to newly created melee and recon units in the city.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Grants access to the Web Spell. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When stationed in a city, +10% chance to grant Spider Mutation - Jointed Limbs to newly created melee and recon units in the city.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Gain the ability to burrow underground. Reveal to gain buffs for 1 turn, but also become vulnerable to enemy attacks. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When stationed in a city, +10% chance to grant Spider Mutation - Chitin Carapace to newly created melee and recon units in the city.

TEXT.English: [TAB]Created by the Diet of Worms spell. Adds 4 food and 8 unhealthiness in the city. Lasts until the caster leaves the city.
TEXT.French: [TAB]Created by the Diet of Worms spell. Adds 4 food and 8 unhealthiness in the city. Lasts until the caster leaves the city.

TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]Created by the Diet of Worms spell. Adds 4 food and 8 unhealthiness in the city. Lasts until the caster leaves the city.

TEXT.English: Members of the Archosian tribe survived the harsh winters by learning to source their food from places where others would find unthinkable. The tradition is carried well into the Age of Rebirth.
TEXT.French: Members of the Archosian tribe survived the harsh winters by learning to source their food from places where others would find unthinkable. The tradition is carried well into the Age of Rebirth.
TEXT.German: Members of the Archosian tribe survived the harsh winters by learning to source their food from places where others would find unthinkable. The tradition is carried well into the Age of Rebirth.
TEXT.Italian: Members of the Archosian tribe survived the harsh winters by learning to source their food from places where others would find unthinkable. The tradition is carried well into the Age of Rebirth.
TEXT.Spanish: Members of the Archosian tribe survived the harsh winters by learning to source their food from places where others would find unthinkable. The tradition is carried well into the Age of Rebirth.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Spend 100 Brood Activity to find an extra source of food for the people of the city, at the cost of their health (+4 Food, +8 Unhealthiness)
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Spend 100 Brood Activity to find an extra source of food for the people of the city, at the cost of their health (+4 Food, +8 Unhealthiness)
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Spend 100 Brood Activity to find an extra source of food for the people of the city, at the cost of their health (+4 Food, +8 Unhealthiness)

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Spend 100 Brood Activity to find an extra source of food for the people of the city, at the cost of their health (+4 Food, +8 Unhealthiness)

TEXT.English: The haunting chants of the Haruspex draws forth even the most reclusive children of Mother.
TEXT.French: The haunting chants of the Haruspex draws forth even the most reclusive children of Mother.
TEXT.German: The haunting chants of the Haruspex draws forth even the most reclusive children of Mother.
TEXT.Italian: The haunting chants of the Haruspex draws forth even the most reclusive children of Mother.
TEXT.Spanish: The haunting chants of the Haruspex draws forth even the most reclusive children of Mother.

TEXT.English: Vangards of the Archosian army are known to bless their weapons with the venom of Mother's young before charging headlong into battle.
TEXT.French: Vangards of the Archosian army are known to bless their weapons with the venom of Mother's young before charging headlong into battle.
TEXT.German: Vangards of the Archosian army are known to bless their weapons with the venom of Mother's young before charging headlong into battle.

TEXT.Spanish: Vangards of the Archosian army are known to bless their weapons with the venom of Mother's young before charging headlong into battle.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Sacrifice a Baby Spider without Growth Spurts to gain the Poisoned Blade promotion.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Sacrifice a Baby Spider without Growth Spurts to gain the Poisoned Blade promotion.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Sacrifice a Baby Spider without Growth Spurts to gain the Poisoned Blade promotion.

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Sacrifice a Baby Spider without Growth Spurts to gain the Poisoned Blade promotion.

TEXT.English: When food is scarce, spiders will not hesitate to feed upon their weaker siblings.
TEXT.French: When food is scarce, spiders will not hesitate to feed upon their weaker siblings.
TEXT.German: When food is scarce, spiders will not hesitate to feed upon their weaker siblings.
TEXT.Italian: When food is scarce, spiders will not hesitate to feed upon their weaker siblings.
TEXT.Spanish: When food is scarce, spiders will not hesitate to feed upon their weaker siblings.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Consumes the weakest Baby Spider in stack to recover 15% health.

TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Consumes the weakest Baby Spider in stack to recover 15% health.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Consumes the weakest Baby Spider in stack to recover 15% health.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Consumes the weakest Baby Spider in stack to recover 15% health.

TEXT.English: These elaborate traps woven in the deep forests can be deadly to most, but a clever forager would know how to make his fortune from it by harvesting silk and venom.
TEXT.French: These elaborate traps woven in the deep forests can be deadly to most, but a clever forager would know how to make his fortune from it by harvesting silk and venom.
TEXT.German: These elaborate traps woven in the deep forests can be deadly to most, but a clever forager would know how to make his fortune from it by harvesting silk and venom.
TEXT.Italian: These elaborate traps woven in the deep forests can be deadly to most, but a clever forager would know how to make his fortune from it by harvesting silk and venom.
TEXT.Spanish: These elaborate traps woven in the deep forests can be deadly to most, but a clever forager would know how to make his fortune from it by harvesting silk and venom.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Removes [LINK=PROMOTION_HASTED]Hasted[\LINK] and grants the [LINK=PROMOTION_SLOW]Slow[\LINK] debuff on non-Spider units who are not part of the Archosian tribe.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Removes [LINK=PROMOTION_HASTED]Hasted[\LINK] and grants the [LINK=PROMOTION_SLOW]Slow[\LINK] debuff on non-Spider units who are not part of the Archosian tribe.

TEXT.English: An Archosian feast is also a sacrifice to Mother. A choice portion is prepared, the meat of the thighbones: it is wrapped in a double fold of fat and the outside covered with small pieces of meat from different parts of the animal. Wine is poured over it, a libation, and the eight-legged critters carry it to the goddess below before the sacrificers at last begin their meal.
TEXT.French: An Archosian feast is also a sacrifice to Mother. A choice portion is prepared, the meat of the thighbones: it is wrapped in a double fold of fat and the outside covered with small pieces of meat from different parts of the animal. Wine is poured over it, a libation, and the eight-legged critters carry it to the goddess below before the sacrificers at last begin their meal.

A choice portion is prepared, the meat of the thighbones: it is wrapped in a double fold of fat and the outside covered with small pieces of meat from different parts of the animal. Wine is poured over it, a libation, and the eight-legged critters carry it to the goddess below before the sacrificers at last begin their meal.
TEXT.Italian: An Archosian feast is also a sacrifice to Mother. A choice portion is prepared, the meat of the thighbones: it is wrapped in a double fold of fat and the outside covered with small pieces of meat from different parts of the animal. Wine is poured over it, a libation, and the eight-legged critters carry it to the goddess below before the sacrificers at last begin their meal.
TEXT.Spanish: An Archosian feast is also a sacrifice to Mother. A choice portion is prepared, the meat of the thighbones: it is wrapped in a double fold of fat and the outside covered with small pieces of meat from different parts of the animal. Wine is poured over it, a libation, and the eight-legged critters carry it to the goddess below before the sacrificers at last begin their meal.
